original: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati.
